# SentinelCBContent

Automated Microsoft Sentinel content — detections, workbooks, and hunting queries generated by ClawdBot based on the latest threat intelligence.

## Structure

- **Detections/** — KQL analytic rules mapped to MITRE ATT&CK
- **Workbooks/** — Azure Sentinel workbook ARM templates
- **Hunting/** — KQL hunting queries for proactive threat hunting

## Sources Monitored

- MITRE ATT&CK updates
- CISA advisories & KEV catalog
- Microsoft Security blog
- CVE/NVD feeds
- Vendor threat intel (Mandiant, CrowdStrike, Recorded Future, etc.)

## Auto-generated

Content in this repo is automatically created and pushed by ClawdBot. Each detection includes:
- Threat description and source
- KQL query
- MITRE ATT&CK technique mapping
- Severity and tactic classification
